name: Luxury Bone Straight Wig
description: 100% premium human hair wig with silky, bone-straight texture. It blends naturally with your scalp, offering a seamless hairline and long-lasting shine. Tangle-free, heat-resistant, and perfect for both casual and luxury occasions.

name: HD Closure Wig
description: 100% human hair wig with invisible HD lace closure that blends perfectly with any skin tone. Soft, natural texture with minimal shedding. Provides a flawless hairline for everyday or special occasions.

name: Glow Up Body Oil
description: Lightweight, fast-absorbing body oil made with natural oils like jojoba and almond oil. Leaves your skin glowing with a non-greasy finish. Perfect for dry skin and everyday hydration.

name: Silk Hair Bonnet
description: Luxurious silk bonnet that protects hair from breakage, reduces frizz, and maintains moisture overnight. Perfect for natural hair, wigs, and braids.

name: 24K Gold Lip Gloss
description: Hydrating lip gloss infused with real gold shimmer particles. Non-sticky, high-shine finish that keeps your lips moisturized all day. Perfect for a luxury makeup look.

name: Luxury Mink Lashes
description: 100% reusable mink lashes with soft, lightweight fibers that give a natural yet glamorous look. Easy to apply and perfect for any makeup style.

name: Brow Growth Serum
description: Nourishing brow serum enriched with castor oil and biotin. Promotes thicker, fuller brows in just 4 weeks. Suitable for all skin types.

name: Edge Control Gel
description: Long-lasting edge control gel with a non-flaking formula. Provides 24-hour hold while moisturizing hair edges and promoting hair growth.

name: Rose Water Facial Toner
description: Refreshing facial toner made with pure rose water. Hydrates, balances pH levels, and soothes skin while minimizing pores.

name: Honey Glow Body Scrub
description: Exfoliating body scrub made with honey, sugar, and essential oils. Removes dead skin cells, leaving your skin soft, smooth, and glowing.

name: Luxury Press On Nails
description: Salon-quality reusable press-on nails in various designs. Easy to apply and long-lasting. Perfect for quick glam without the hassle.

name: Shea Butter Lip Balm
description: Moisturizing lip balm made with natural shea butter. Heals dry, cracked lips while leaving them soft and nourished.

name: Hair Growth Oil
description: 100% natural oil blend that stimulates hair growth, prevents hair loss, and thickens hair. Made with castor oil, rosemary, and essential vitamins.

name: Luxury Edge Brush
description: Double-sided brush and comb designed for perfect baby hair styling. Gentle on hair and easy to use.

name: Coconut Glow Body Butter
description: Rich body butter infused with coconut oil and shea butter. Deeply moisturizes and leaves skin with a radiant glow and tropical scent.

name: Nude Matte Lipstick
description: Long-lasting velvet matte finish.

name: Microfiber Hair Towel
description: Dries hair faster without frizz.

name: Luxury Satin Scrunchies
description: Prevents hair breakage and adds style.

name: Blossom Body Mist
description: Fresh floral fragrance for everyday use.

name: Glass Skin Facial Serum
description: Gives your face that natural glassy glow.
